Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) consist of ceramic materials.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: Because of the brittle nature of ceramics, durability decrease of a SOFC system or mechanical failure of cells can be caused by transient behavior, that is, sudden temperature variation and axial temperature gradient.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: Therefore, it is important to understand the transient behavior of a SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: To study the transient behavior of a direct internal reforming (DIR) planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a one-dimensional dynamic model is presented.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: This model is modified to predict the heat-up and start-up behavior.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: The heat-up time and start-up time are calculated from the model.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: The heat-up time can be adjusted by manipulating air velocity and temperature.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: During the start-up mode, the effects of initial temperature of the PEN (positive electrode/electrolyte/negative electrode) structure and air temperature are investigated.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: The fuel cell characteristics such as cell voltage, current density distribution, and temperature distribution can be calculated from the modified dynamic model.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation

Sentencas: Consequently, this model can be useful to investigate the transient behavior during heat-up and start-up modes.
Titulo: Numerical Study of a Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell during Heat-up and Start-up Operation
